resources.string: This Activity displays the menu of different categories in a music app such as all songs,artists,playlists,genres.
This Activity displays all the songs on the device any song can be clicked to play.
This activity shows the songs of dance genere
This activity shows the songs of pop genere
This activity shows the songs of jazz genere
This activity shows the songs of various generes
This activity consists of play,pause,next,prev buttons for playing a song displays a toast message
This activity shows the playlist created by user
This activity shows the songs added in playlist1
